short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the icon for search results on Ecosia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple addon to show the icon of a website next to its url in Ecosia searches. Using the DuckDuckGo API, the addon requests and places the favicon of the result next to the url of the site, with the size of the icon being customizable.
